name: likeeno
description: لایکینو - فروش فالوور، لایک و بازدید برای شبکه‌های اجتماعی

scripts.db:generate: node -e "const provider = process.env.DATABASE_PROVIDER || 'sqlite'; const schema = provider === 'postgresql' ? 'schema.postgres.prisma' : 'schema.prisma'; require('child_process').execSync('prisma generate --schema=prisma/' + schema, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.db:migrate: node -e "const provider = process.env.DATABASE_PROVIDER || 'sqlite'; const schema = provider === 'postgresql' ? 'schema.postgres.prisma' : 'schema.prisma'; require('child_process').execSync('prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/' + schema, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: node -e "const provider = process.env.DATABASE_PROVIDER || 'sqlite'; const schema = provider === 'postgresql' ? 'schema.postgres.prisma' : 'schema.prisma'; require('child_process').execSync('prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/' + schema, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.db:studio: node -e "const provider = process.env.DATABASE_PROVIDER || 'sqlite'; const schema = provider === 'postgresql' ? 'schema.postgres.prisma' : 'schema.prisma'; require('child_process').execSync('prisma studio --schema=prisma/' + schema, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
